Source.SQL: SELECT jg.fuwujgbh fuwujgbh, jg.fuwujgmc fuwujgmc, huochan.num as huochan, zaochan.total as zaochanzs, zaochan.high as hrzaochan, zaochan.low as lrzaochan, zaochan.qy as zaochanqy, zaochan.zy as zaochanzy, zaochan.qt as zaochanqt, zaochan.sw as zaochansw FROM ( select fuwujgbh,fuwujgmc from GY_FUWUJG where 1=1 and dizhibm = @dizhibm and fuwujgbh = @organization and fuwujgmc like @fuwujgmc order by fuwujgbh asc @Pager ) jg left JOIN ( SELECT jg.fuwujgbh, count(*) AS num FROM cdh_deliveryrecord cdr LEFT JOIN GY_FUWUJG jg ON jg.FUWUJGBH = cdr.visitunitcode WHERE cdr.outcomeofpregnancy = '1' AND cdr.status = '1' and CONVERT(varchar(100), cdr.deliverydate, 23) >= @checkDayStart and CONVERT(varchar(100), cdr.deliverydate, 23) < dateadd(day,1,@checkDayEnd) AND jg.fuwujgbh in ( select fuwujgbh from GY_FUWUJG where 1=1 and dizhibm = @dizhibm and fuwujgbh = @organization and fuwujgmc like @fuwujgmc order by fuwujgbh asc @Pager ) GROUP BY jg.fuwujgbh ) huochan ON huochan.fuwujgbh = jg.fuwujgbh left JOIN ( SELECT jg.fuwujgbh, sum(case when cg.highrisktype = '18' or cg.highrisktype = '01' or ch.highrisktype = '18' or ch.highrisktype = '01' then 1 else 0 end) as total, sum(case when cg.highrisktype = '18' or ch.highrisktype = '18' then 1 else 0 end) as high, sum(case when cg.highrisktype = '01' or ch.highrisktype = '01' then 1 else 0 end) as low, sum(case when (cg.highrisktype = '18' or cg.highrisktype = '01' or ch.highrisktype = '18' or ch.highrisktype = '01') and ch.endresult = '1' then 1 else 0 end) as qy, sum(case when (cg.highrisktype = '18' or cg.highrisktype = '01' or ch.highrisktype = '18' or ch.highrisktype = '01') and ch.endresult = '6' then 1 else 0 end) as zy, sum(case when (cg.highrisktype = '18' or cg.highrisktype = '01' or ch.highrisktype = '18' or ch.highrisktype = '01') and ch.endresult = '7' then 1 else 0 end) as qt, sum(case when (cg.highrisktype = '18' or cg.highrisktype = '01' or ch.highrisktype = '18' or ch.highrisktype = '01') and ch.endresult = '4' then 1 else 0 end) as sw FROM cc_generalinfo cg LEFT JOIN cc_highrisk ch ON cg.childid = ch.childid LEFT JOIN GY_FUWUJG jg ON jg.FUWUJGBH = cg.createUnit WHERE 1=1 and CONVERT(varchar(100), cg.birthDay, 23) >= @checkDayStart and CONVERT(varchar(100), cg.birthDay, 23) < dateadd(day,1,@checkDayEnd) jg.fuwujgbh in ( select fuwujgbh from GY_FUWUJG where 1=1 and dizhibm = @dizhibm and fuwujgbh = @organization and fuwujgmc like @fuwujgmc order by fuwujgbh asc @Pager ) GROUP BY jg.fuwujgbh ) zaochan ON zaochan.fuwujgbh = jg.fuwujgbh
Source.CountSQL: select count(*) from ( select fuwujgbh from GY_FUWUJG where 1=1 and dizhibm = @dizhibm and fuwujgbh = @organization and fuwujgmc like @fuwujgmc group by fuwujgbh )a
